name: ANRABESS Women's Oversized Turtleneck Batwing Sleeve Spilt Casual Loose Knit Tunic Pullover Sweater Tops 2024 Fall Outfits

title: See why this sweater is flattering for everyone!
content: This sweater has the perfect size turtleneck, not too tight or too short. The length of the sweater hits right around the bum area and fits loose but still flattering. The material is soft yet doesn’t change shape and the quality is amazing! Highly recommend!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I am usually a 16-18 and I decided after reading other reviews to purchase the large instead of X-Large.  I washed in cold water on gentle cycle.  I tried it on & love it!!  It’s soft and  looks Great.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2024

title: Size is larger than needed
content: I was very pleased with the sweater I ordered.  It was well made and thick enough material to hang right when I tried it on.  No clinging.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Really soft fabric that feels lightweight but also warm. It’s a really cute, flattering cut.

title: Great sweater

title: Verified Purchase
content: Fit and length perfect to replace a bulky jacket over light top.  Collar keeps the chill out.  Washes well. Arms are not too tight.  Not those silly bat wings. I think I bought a size down because it ran big.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023

title: Cute fit but color is different than expected. It’s not for me.
content: The sky blue color is a beautiful turquoise.  The fabric is soft and not scratchy and has good amount of stretch.  Size up 2 sizes to get the loose look in the picture.  I ordered my normal size according to the size chart and it was tight around the neck and sleeves and much shorter, so I returned it.  I would have ordered a larger size, but the price jumped over $15.  :-(
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Update: I did order the larger size.  The sleeves and neck are still tighter than shown in the picture.  The turtleneck is excessively long, and it does not lay nicely like in the picture when folded down once, because it's tight.  I have to fold it twice and then it fits like a snug turtleneck, not loose like pictured.  The back is a lot longer than the front, but I don't hate that.  I'm keeping it because it's soft and stretchy and I love the color.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2024

title: Perfect sweater!
content: I love the feel of the sweater and the size and color is perfect
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2024

title: Verified Purchase

title: Not pretty in pink (LOL) but almond color is true to photos
content: I absolutely love this sweater! It’s very soft but has enough h weight to it that it holds a nice shape when wearing. The front is about 2 inches shorter than the back. This is great because it looks nice untucked but also works well with just the front tucked in. The turtleneck part is wide so it’s not constricting and has a nice drape to it. I’ve worn it multiple times with leggings (the back is long enough to provide sole cover) and with jeans. Washes well and keeps its shape while still being super soft. I’m going to buy a few more in other colors. I bought a small and fit is good (it’s generously sized and maybe for some will
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: Be a bit wide but I like the relaxed fit)..I’m 5’5 and 125 lbs.

title: Cool sweater
content: 2023 UPDATE: I ordered the almond color again, and it looks much better this year—I’m quite happy with the rosier tones in an overall light brown sweater. (The color is very true to photos.) I ordered a medium, and while it’s not as oversized as the photo shows in length and the sleeves, it’s still decently oversized in the back and width. So, not as long in the front hem or slouchy in the arms, but I’m keeping it because I know I’ll layer it with coats and such. If you want a truly oversized look, I’d consider sizing up.

title: Verified Purchase
content: Very soft and thick material. I have one of this style and a few of another from the same company. They pull easily but you can pull the loop through to the inside so it’s easy to fix. Washes well and stays soft. Runs big. I’m 5’4” 125#. Small fits perfectly. Ordered the pink and it’s nothing like the picture. It’s more of a dusty pink mauve.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023

title: Really cute
content: This sweater is my new favorite and I’ve already purchased 2 more since this black one! It is so soft, drapes lovely over the body, and hangs at just the right length for me to wear leggings with it.  For reference, I’m 5’3, 220, and an hour-glass shape with most of my weight in my chest and booty/thighs, and I ordered the XL.  I’m typically XL top and 14/16 bottom.  I say this drapes lovely on the body, because it flows over curves, hugging the right spots, while being loose in the spots you don’t want “clingy”.  I just received the green color today, and decided to downsize and try that in the Large.  Fit wise, they are almost identical, with the XL being slightly more roomy and maybe 2” longer for booty coverage.  I will be living in these because it looks so put together while feeling like your favorite sweatshirt.  Very classy looking. Keep in mind this is a “high/low” hem with the back being approximately 2-3” longer than the front.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2022

title: Verified Purchase
content: Soft, warm, comfortable.  Nice sweater

title: Inconsistent sizing
content: When the second sweater arrived, it was immediately obvious that it was smaller than the first that I received; body and sleeves were too short and neck opening was significantly smaller.  In addition, there was a sewing needle stuck in the sweater!  Seriously?  I almost got stuck.  So which sweater was incorrectly sized?  I've no idea.  But I'm keeping the first and returning the second.  This sweater is marketed as an oversized sweater, so guessing that the size on the second sweater was inaccurate.  Consider yourself warned!!
